title: Boffins. - Volume 2.
creator_credit: ABC Video, Film Australia and Ian Munro
brief_description: Ever wonder why the moon stays up, or why sound travels through air? Boffins do. This second volume of the delightful children’s series will both entertain 4-7 year olds and help explain the “Laws of Nature.” The episodes are: “Upwards and downwards” (the force of gravity), “Life in the balance” (the centre of gravity), “Water water everywhere” (how to use a syphon), “The Disappearing water” (the evaporation of water).
